document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">over </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Jordan, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Genesis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">record, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Angel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Wrestler </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">wrestle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">hard. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4064ff">Till, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">morning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">touching </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">mountain, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Jacob </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">waxing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">strong, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Angel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">begged </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">permission </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">breakfast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">return. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">quoth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#889098">wily </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Jacob </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#889098">girt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">loins </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">anew, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Until </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">bless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">stranger!" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">acceded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to: </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">Light </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">swung </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#705cff">silver </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">fleeces </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Peniel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">hills </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">among, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">astonished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Wrestler </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">Found </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">worsted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70c8ff">God! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
